name: A.I.dle Reborn
text: Target 1 "@Ignister" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except Cyberse monsters. When an attack is declared involving 2 monsters: You can banish this card from your GY and 1 card from your hand, then target 1 of your "A.I." Spells/Traps that is banished or in your GY, except "A.I.dle Reborn"; add that card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "A.I.dle Reborn" once per turn.
